Entries.Wed: Why hello there! If you see my friend {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}} in town, could you tell her I said 'Hi'?#$e#Thanks!$h
Entries.Sat: Hi! Welcome to {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SandyName}}'s Oasis, the number one destination in Calico Desert!#$e#*whisper* Did I sound professional?$h#$e#Make sure to check out our seasonal seed selection.#$e#You look really thirsty. Here, have a taste of this ice cold milk. [184]#$e#Tasty, huh?$h
Entries.Fri4: My name's not really {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SandyName}}, you know. It's just good for business.#$e#But everyone calls me {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SandyName}} anyway, so I've just gotten used to it.
